channel.title: Comments on: Lego Robots
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: By: Trevor Adams
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: This was such an excellent session! The hardware was behaving nicely. I have to give some serious consideration to getting one of these kits 'for the kids'.
item.content:encoded: This was such an excellent session! The hardware was behaving nicely. I have to give some serious consideration to getting one of these kits ‘for the kids’.

item.title: By: Jonathan Willis

item.description: I'm really looking forward to this!
